answers.answer: Do you have diabetes?I only ask because so many people that I know that have diabetes take longer to heal...and those with other immune deficiencies.The clear, sticky, liquid is the stuff that your body is producing when trying to heal you.Have you had your thyroid checked lately? If not, it's a good idea to do so.Have you seen your doctor lately to show him that the medication didn't work? If not, now would be the time to do so.Did your doctor do a biopsy? Did he actually scrape some of it off and send it away to determine that it isn't cancer?If not please see him again and ask that he do so.

question: I have a head sore that I've had for about 2 years. Been to the doctor with it, and was perscribed antibiotics. Sore is on the crown of my head. Sore scabs up and has a clear sticky liquid coming from it. Does not seem to go away. Doctor said it is not cancer.
title: Head Sore
